maqras.text: Allah ta’ala ka hukm aa pahoncha, ab us ki jaldi na machaao, tamaam paaki us ke liye hai, wo bartar hai un sub se jinhe ye Allah ke nazdeek shareek batlaate hai
wahi farishto ko apni wahi de kar apne hukm se apne bandho mein se jis par chaahta hai utaarta hai ke tum logo ko aagah kardo ke mere siva koyi maboodh nahi, pas tum mujh se daro
osi ne aasmaano aur zameen ko haq ke saath paida kiya, wo us se bari hai jo mushrik karte hai
us ne insaan ko nutfe se paida kiya, phir wo sarih jhagdaalo ban baitha
osi ne chau paaye paida kiye jin mein tumhaare liye garmi ke libaas hai aur bhi bahuth se nafa hai aur baaz tumhaare khaane ke kaam aate hai
aur un mein tumhaari raunaq bhi hai, jab chara kar lao tabh bhi aur jab charaane le jao tabh bhi
aur wo tumhaare bojh un shehro tak utha le jaate hai jahaan tum baghair aadhi jaan kiye pahonch hee nahi sakte thein, yaqinan tumhaara rab bada hee shafeeq aur nihaayath meherbaan hai
ghudo ko, khaccharo ko, gadhu ko us ne paida kiya ke tum un ki sawaari lo aur wo baayes zeenath bhi hai aur bhi wo aisi bahuth si cheeze paida karta hai jin ka tumhe ilm bhi nahi
aur Allah par sidhi raah ka bata dena hai aur baaz tedi raahe hai aur agar wo chaahta to tum sub ko raahe raast par laga deta
wahi tumhaare fayede ke liye aasmaan se paani barsaata hai jise tum pite bhi ho aur osi se oge hoye daraqto ko tum apne jaanwaro ko charaate ho
osi se wo tumhaare liye kheti aur zaitoon aur khajoor aur angoor aur har qism ke phal ugaata hai, beshak un logo ke liye to us mein badi nishaani hai jo ghaur wa fikr karte hai
osi ne raath din aur suraj chaand ko tumhaare liye taabe kar diya hai aur sitaare bhi osi ke hukm ke ma tehet hai, yaqinan us mein aqal mandh logo ke liye kayi ek nishaaniya maujood hai
aur bhi bahuth si cheeze tarah tarah ke rang roop ki us ne tumhaare liye zameen par phaila rakhi hai, beshak nasihath qubool karne waalo ke liye us mein badi bhaari nishaani hai

aur darya bhi osi ne tumhaare bus mein kar diye hai ke tum us mein se (nikla hoa) taaza gosht khaao aur us mein se apne pehenne ke zeweraath nikaal sako aur tum dekhte ho ke kashtiya us mein paani cheerti hoyi (chalti) hai aur is liye bhi ke tum us ka fazl talaash karo aur ho sakta hai ke tum shukr guzaari bhi karo
aur us ne zameen mein pahaad gaad diye hai ta ke tumhe le kar hale na aur nehre aur raahe bana diye ta ke tum manzil maqsood ko pahoncho
aur bhi bahuth si nishaaniya muqarrar farmayi aur sitaaro se bhi log raah haasil karte hai
to kya wo jo paida karta hai us jaisa hai jo paida nahi kar saakta? kya tum bilkul nahi soonchte
aur agar tum Allah ki nemato ka shumaar karna chaaho to tum ose nahi kar sakte, beshak Allah bada baqshne wala meherbaan hai
aur jo kuch tum chupaao aur zaaher karo Allah ta’ala sab kuch jaanta hai
aur jin jin ko ye log Allah ta’ala ke siva pukaarte hai wo kisi cheez ko paida nahi kar sakte balke wo khud paida kiye hoye hai
murde hai, zinda nahi, unhe to ye bhi sha’oor nahi ke kab uthaaye jayenge
tum sub ka maboodh sirf Allah ta’ala akela hai aur aaqirath par imaan na rakhne walo ke dil munkir hai aur wo khud takabbur se bhare hoye hai
beshak wa shuba Allah ta’ala har us cheez ko jise wo log chupaate hai aur jise zaaher karte hai baqoobi jaanta hai, wo ghuroor karne walo ke pasand nahi farmaata
un se jab daryaaft kiya jaata hai ke tumhaare parvardigaar ne kya naazil farmaya hai? to jawaab dete hai ke aglo ki kahaaniya hai
osi ka natija hoga ke qayamath ke din ye log apne pure bojh ke saath hee un ke boojh ke bhi hisse daar honge jinhe be ilmi se gumraah karte rahe, dekho to kaisa bura boojh utha rahe hai

un se pehle ke logo ne bhi makar kiya tha (aaqir) Allah ne (un ke mansubo) ki imaarato ko jado se uqed diya aur un (ke saroon) par (un ki) chate upar se gir padi aur un ke paas azaab wahaan se aa gaya jahaan ka unhe wahem wa gumaan bhi na tha

phir qayamath waale din bhi Allah ta’ala unhe ruswa karega aur farmayega ke mere wo shareek kahaan hai jin ke baare mein tum ladte jhagadte thein, jinhe ilm diya gaya tha, wo pukaar uthenge ke aaj to kaafiro ko ruswaai aur boraai chimat gayi

wo jo apni jaano par zulm karte hai, farishte jab un ki jaan qabz karne lagte hai us waqt wo jhuk jaate hai ke hum boraai nahi karte thein, kyo nahi? Allah ta’ala qoob jaane wala hai jo kuch tum karte thein
pas ab to hameshgi ke taur par tum jahannum ke darwaazo mein daakhil ho jao, pas kya hee bura tikhana hai ghuroor karne walo ka
